descriptionHtml:
Hello and welcome to the ADD DLC ITEMS MOD
by Adrian85858
------------------------------------------
I am sick of having to go to solstiem for bonemould.
This modification adds every item from the Dragonborn DLC to the merchant lists in Riften. This uses a seperate script rather than drag and drop. This includes stalhrim and skall weapons in l8r levels. This also includes materials, food, weapons, misc itemsand ingredients to their appropriate merchants. You know the drill to install an ESP. Hope you enjoy and use this with my other mods:

Mo'Morrowind Monsters
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58030/?

Mo'Mushrooms
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57695/?

Be sure to drop in comments on any bugs/glitches. This is not a WIP unless I get some feedback to push it.And as always, thanks for downloading and have a gr8 g8 m8.
author: ad
